cause.description:
FOR PEOPLE WHO WANDER OUTSIDE OF SOCIETY, WiTH NOTHING BUT PENS AND PAPER AND BOOZE AND DRUGS AND LOW SELF-ESTEEM AND BAD BREATH AND BAD FASHION SENSE AND STRANGE LOVE FOR ANIMALS AND HIGH MEDICAL BILLS AND AN INCREDIBLE NEED FOR PSYCHIATRIC EVALUATION AND.....A PROFOUND SENSE OF JOBLESSNESS AND WHO ARE CIXELSYD AND GENERALLY SCREWED!!!!!! AND MUST LOVE POETRY
1. TO FIGHT FOR OUR RIGHT TO PARTY
2. TO FLY WITHOUT WINGS
3. TO ROCK WITHOUT ROLLS
4. TO JUMP OFF CLIFFS AND BE LEGENDS
cause.name: FREE POETS FROM POVERTY
